name: heroku-nextjs
description: Deploy Next.js server-side React apps to Heroku

scripts.postinstall: if [ "$NODE_ENV" = production ] ; then APP_NAMESPACE=nextjs APP_DIR=/app/$APP_NAMESPACE; BUILD_DIR=$(pwd); mkdir -p $APP_DIR; mv $BUILD_DIR/* $APP_DIR/; cd $APP_DIR; npm run build; mkdir -p $BUILD_DIR/$APP_NAMESPACE; mv $APP_DIR/* $APP_DIR/.[!.]* $BUILD_DIR/$APP_NAMESPACE/; cd $BUILD_DIR; mv $APP_NAMESPACE/Procfile . ; fi

author: Mars Hall
